revised_title: Influence of Impurities on Mechanical Properties of Metals
tldr: The author investigates the effects of small quantities of impurities on the mechanical properties of metals, specifically focusing on gold. They found that the presence of impurities significantly alters the tenacity and extensibility of metals, and that these changes can be explained by the Law of Periodicity. This research has implications for understanding the behavior of metals in industrial applications and improving their properties.
